document.full_text: a court overseeing an extended battle between the justice department and an array of tobacco companies declined on wednesday to shut the case because tobacco is regulated under a new law.
document.title: u.s. judge declines to shut tobacco racketeering case
lines_and_colors: a court overseeing an extended battle between the justice department and an array of tobacco companies declined on wednesday to shut the case because tobacco is regulated under a new law.
